trans-unit.source: Provides a way to apply custom logic to a binding.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法，將自訂邏輯套用至繫結。

trans-unit.source: If you want to associate a value converter with a binding, create a class that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter> interface and then implement the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要與繫結產生關聯的值轉換器，建立一個類別，實作<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter>介面，然後實作<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Converters can change data from one type to another, translate data based on cultural information, or modify other aspects of the presentation.
trans-unit.target: 轉換器可以從一種類型變更資料、 轉譯資料根據文化特性資訊，或修改展示檔的其他層面。

trans-unit.source: For examples of some typical converter scenarios, see "Data Conversion" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 一些典型的轉換器案例的範例，請參閱 「 資料轉換 」，在[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Value converters are culture-aware.
trans-unit.target: 值轉換器會感知文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods have a `culture` parameter that indicates the cultural information.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法有`culture`參數，指出文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: If cultural information is irrelevant to the conversion, then you can ignore that parameter in your custom converter.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換的文化特性資訊無關，您可以在您自訂轉換子中忽略該參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods also have a parameter called `parameter` so that you can use the same instance of the converter with different parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法也會有參數，呼叫`parameter`，讓您可以使用不同的參數使用相同的執行個體的轉換器。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can write a formatting converter that produces different formats of data based on the input parameter that you use.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以撰寫會產生不同格式的資料是根據您使用的輸入參數的格式轉換子。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ConverterParameter%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> class to pass a parameter as an argument into the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ConverterParameter%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>類別傳遞參數做為引數至<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value produced by the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 由繫結來源所產生的值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 繫結目標屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: The converter parameter to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的轉換子參數。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要在轉換子中使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Converts a value.
trans-unit.target: 轉換值。

trans-unit.source: A converted value.
trans-unit.target: 轉換過的值。

trans-unit.source: If the method returns <see langword="null" />, the valid null value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法傳回 <see langword="null" />，就會使用有效的 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates a value from the binding source to the binding target.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結引擎在傳播到繫結目標的繫結來源的值時呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The data binding engine does not catch exceptions that are thrown by a user-supplied converter.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結引擎不會攔截例外狀況擲回由使用者提供的轉換器。

trans-unit.source: Any exception that is thrown by the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> method, or any uncaught exceptions that are thrown by methods that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> method calls, are treated as run-time errors.
trans-unit.target: 就會擲回任何例外狀況<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>方法所擲回任何無法攔截例外狀況，<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>方法呼叫，會被視為執行階段錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Handle anticipated problems by returning <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 處理預期的問題，藉由傳回<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A return value of <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> indicates that the converter produced no value and that the binding uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>, if available, or the default value instead.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值為<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>表示轉換器會產生任何值，並繫結使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>，如果有的話的預設值改為或。

trans-unit.source: A return value of <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing?displayProperty=nameWithType> indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A> or default value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值為<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing?displayProperty=nameWithType>表示繫結不會不傳送值或使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>或預設值。

trans-unit.source: The value that is produced by the binding target.
trans-unit.target: 由繫結目標所產生的值。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的目標類型。

trans-unit.source: The converter parameter to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的轉換子參數。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要在轉換子中使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Converts a value.
trans-unit.target: 轉換值。

trans-unit.source: A converted value.
trans-unit.target: 轉換過的值。

trans-unit.source: If the method returns <see langword="null" />, the valid null value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法傳回 <see langword="null" />，就會使用有效的 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates a value from the binding target to the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結引擎在傳播到繫結來源對繫結目標的值時呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method must be the inverse of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的實作必須是函數的反函數<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The data binding engine does not catch exceptions that are thrown by a user-supplied converter.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結引擎不會攔截例外狀況擲回由使用者提供的轉換器。

trans-unit.source: Any exception that is thrown by the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> method, or any uncaught exceptions that are thrown by methods that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A> method calls, are treated as run-time errors.
trans-unit.target: 就會擲回任何例外狀況<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法所擲回任何無法攔截例外狀況，<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>方法呼叫，會被視為執行階段錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Handle anticipated problems by returning <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>.<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>.
trans-unit.target: 處理預期的問題，藉由傳回<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>。<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>。

trans-unit.source: A return value of <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> indicates that the converter produced no value and that the binding uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>, if available, or the default value instead.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值為<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>表示轉換器會產生任何值，並繫結使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>，如果有的話的預設值改為或。

trans-unit.source: A return value of <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing?displayProperty=nameWithType> indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A> or default value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值為<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing?displayProperty=nameWithType>表示繫結不會不傳送值或使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue%2A>或預設值。
